      DirectedSimpleVertex()

    • Method Detail

      • addAdjacency

        public <T extends Vertex> boolean addAdjacency(T to)
        Description copied from interface: Vertex
        Adds the specified vertex to the set of adjacencies. Note that this method only adds a directed adjacency. If the vertex belongs to an undirected graph, the graph will be put into an inconsistent state if an adjacency (u, v) is added using this method without also adding the directed adjacency (v, u)!
        Parameters:
        to - vertex to be added
        Returns:
        true if the adjacency list did not already contain to

      • removeAdjacency

        public boolean removeAdjacency(Vertex to)
        Description copied from interface: Vertex
        Removes the specified vertex from the adjacency set. Note that this method only removes a directed adjacency.
        Parameters:
        to - vertex to be removed
        Returns:
        true if the vertex was found in the adjacency set

      • clearAdjacencies

        public void clearAdjacencies()
        Description copied from interface: Vertex
        Removes all vertices from the adjacency set. The adjacency set will be empty after this call returns. The cautionary statements regarding the use of removeAdjacency() in an undirected graph also apply to this method.

      • containsAdjacency

        public boolean containsAdjacency(Vertex to)
        Description copied from interface: Vertex
        Returns true if the adjacency set contains the specified vertex
        Parameters:
        to - vertex whose presence is to be tested
        Returns:
        true if to is found in the adjacency set

      • adjacencyCount

        public final int adjacencyCount()
        Description copied from interface: Vertex
        Returns the number of vertices in the adjacency set
        Returns:
        the number of vertices in this adjacency set (its cardinality)

      • getAdjacencies

        public final java.util.Set<? extends Vertex> getAdjacencies()
        Description copied from interface: Vertex
        Returns a set of all adjacent vertices
        Returns:
        a set of all adjacent vertices

      • hasAdjacencies

        public final boolean hasAdjacencies()
        Description copied from interface: Vertex
        Returns true if the vertex is the tail of at least one edge
        Returns:
        true if the vertex has at least one adjacency
